name: Too Many Weird Aliens
description:
The game was made for Ludum Dare 38 "Small World".

The planet earth is under attack by those dastardly aliens... again. It's up to you to save humanity. Defend earth from alien attacks while gathering health packs to repair your ship and restore earth. Avoid crashing into enemy ships and the sun.

Controls:

W: Forward
A, D: Turn
S: Slow
: Fire


Ludum Dare Page
